entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text: On behalf of my dear friends in #HongKong I say to Fellow Americans: Please pay attn to what is going down now in Beijing. The National Party Congress just voted what amounts to a 100% elimination of democracy in HK & possible Chinese military intervention, under #COVID19 cover. https://t.co/6XBhVj1d57
